ThingDef.label: RC ShimakazeBody
ThingDef.description: I am Shimakaze, the Shimakaze-class ship that was developed as the pinnacle of destroyers, fast and armed with heavy torpedos. After all, I can go faster than 40 knots. However, I wasn't suited for mass production so I was the only one built.

ThingDef.label: RC ShimakazeWig
ThingDef.description: I'm Destroyer Shimakaze. When it comes to speed I'm the best there is, swift like the island breeze!

ThingDef.label: RC AmatsukazeBody
ThingDef.description: I'm Amatsukaze, the Ninth Kagerou-class Destroyer. I was tasked with being the test bed of a new type of high-temperature, high pressure boiler meant for the next generation of destroyer. With the data in tow, I was able to hand this over to Shimakaze. I was in many tight spots, but I have been able to constantly overcome them. It was really tough!

ThingDef.label: RC AmatsukazeWig
ThingDef.description: Is a nice breeze coming? It's time for me, the next generation destroyer prototype, Amatsukaze, to debut.

ThingDef.label: RC TokitsukazeBody
ThingDef.description: Tenth Kagerou-class Destroyer, Tokitsukaze. I worked hard in the 16th Destroyer Division with my friends Yukikaze, Hatsukaze, and Amatsukaze. I was also in the 2nd Torpedo Squadron you know, really, really. But...an uncontrolled sea seems...kinda unpleasant.

ThingDef.label: RC TokitsukazeWig
ThingDef.description: Kagerou-class Destroyer tenth ship. Tokitsukaze... has arrived!

ThingDef.label: RC YukikazeBody
ThingDef.description: I'm Yukikaze, eighth ship of the Kagerou-class destroyer. Among the destroyers of the main fleet, while taking part in over 10 major naval battles, I'm the only one to have survived the war with barely any damage. Miracle destroyer? Nope, it was no miracle!

ThingDef.label: RC YukikazeWig
ThingDef.description: The eighth ship of Kagerou-class destroyer, I'm Yukikaze. I'll be in your care!

ThingDef.label: RC AkizukiBody
ThingDef.description: Designed for the fleet's anti-air, Type-B first class destroyer, Akizuki-class 1st destroyer, Akizuki. As an anti-air ship equipped with 4x 8-barrel Long 10cm guns and anti-aircraft fire director, along with Hatsuzuki and the others, we formed the 61st DesDiv. I'll do my best!

ThingDef.label: RC AkizukiWig
ThingDef.description: Akizuki-class anti-air destroyer, first ship, Akizuki. I'm reporting in here. Please leave it to me!

ThingDef.label: RC TeruzukiBody
ThingDef.description: 2nd of Akizuki-class Anti-air Destroyer, Teruzuki. With Akizuki-nee, we're organized as Destroyer Squadron 61. In the Battle of Solomon, we fought together with Hiei-san and Kirishima-san! What? The supply drum transport? Ah... that's.... that's...

ThingDef.label: RC TeruzukiWig
ThingDef.description: I am Teruzuki, the second ship of Akizuki-class Anti-air Destroyer! As with Akizuki-neesan, it is a great honor to be in your care!

ThingDef.label: RC HatsuzukiBody
ThingDef.description: Fourth ship of the Akizuki-class anti-air destroyers, Hatsuzuki. I was born in Maizuru. My sisters and I formed the 61st Destroyer Division that fought in the Marianas and Leyte. In anti-air battles, I covered the rescue of aircraft carriers. Acting as a part of the fleet's rear guard, I faced the enemy.

ThingDef.label: RC HatsuzukiWig
ThingDef.description: I'm the fourth ship of the Akizuki-class destroyers, Hatsuzuki. Are you the Admiral? Very well, I'll march on.

ThingDef.label: RC UrakazeBody
ThingDef.description: Osaka-born, attached to Kure. I saw action from Pearl Harbor to Guadalcanal. My last moments were escorting Kongou nee-san at the Taiwan Strait. Anyway, there's nothing that can be done anymore...

ThingDef.label: RC UrakazeWig
ThingDef.description: It's me, Urakaze, nice to meet 'ya!

ThingDef.label: RC IsokazeBody
ThingDef.description: 12th Kagerou-class destroyer, Isokaze. If it's about combat experience, I won't fall behind that Yukikaze. I've fought again and again, participated in decisive battles, and fought to the bitter end. Yamato, Musashi, Kongou, Taihou... their last moments have been etched into my eyes. This time... I will protect them.

ThingDef.label: RC IsokazeWig
ThingDef.description: 12th Kagerou-class destroyer, Isokaze. Don't worry, I will protect you.

ThingDef.label: RC HamakazeBody
ThingDef.description: I am Hamakaze. I participated in many fierce battles. At Leyte, I was in Kongou's ring formation. Futhermore, I seared them into my memory Musashi, Kongou and Shinano's last moments. At the fated Bounomisaki, I, Yukikaze and many others struggled to protect Yamato.

ThingDef.label: RC HamakazeWig
ThingDef.description: Destroyer, Hamakaze. Henceforth I shall be attached to your fleet.

ThingDef.label: RC TanikazeBody
ThingDef.description: Madam Tanikaze here! I was helpin' out Hiryuu during the Battle of Midway, damn enemy planes were dropping bombs on us like rain... Back then, C'mmander Katsumi was amazin' like seriously.

ThingDef.label: RC TanikazeWig
ThingDef.description: Admiral, I'm Tanikaze! I'll be in your care from now on.

ThingDef.label: RC HarusameBody
ThingDef.description: Fifth Shiratsuyu-class destroyer, Harusame. Delicious... wait. That's a different kind of Harusame! With Murasame and big sis Yuudachi we toured the sea as Destroyer Division 2! I am a bit good at transportation and guarding missions. Yes!

ThingDef.label: RC HarusameWig
ThingDef.description: Fifth Shiratsuyu-class destroyer, Harusame, yes. Leave the transport missions to me... desu.

ThingDef.label: RC YudachiKaiNiBody
ThingDef.description: I'm Yuudachi, the fourth ship of the Shiratsuyu class. I worked sort of hardish during the Third Battle of the Solomons didn't I? But somehow... the term "Iron Bottom Sound" is really scary, isn't it?

ThingDef.label: RC YudachiKaiNiWig
ThingDef.description: Hi, I'm Yuudachi, a Shiratsuyu-class destroyer. Nice to meet you!

ThingDef.label: RC ShigureKaiNiBody
ThingDef.description: I'm Shigure, second ship of the Shiratsuyu-class destroyers. I was in the fated battle of Surigao Strait under the Nishimura fleet in the battle of Leyte Gulf. Fusou and Yamashiro were amazing... Even if everyone forgets, I'll always remember them...

ThingDef.label: RC ShigureKaiNiWig
ThingDef.description: I'm Shigure, of the Shiratsuyu-class destroyers. Nice to meet you.

ThingDef.label: RC ShiratsuyuKaiNiBody
ThingDef.description: Developed after the Hatsuharu-class destroyer, Shiratsuyu-class, number one, I'm Shiratsuyu! Yeah, number one, the first ship! With lots of upgrades, I'm a true fleet destroyer, you know! Eh? 'Don't be in such a rush that you'll hit a tanker'? Don't worry about it!

ThingDef.label: RC ShiratsuyuKaiNiWig
ThingDef.description: First ship of the Shiratsuyu-class destroyers, 'Shiratsuyu'!. Yes, the first ship!

ThingDef.label: RC MurasameKaiNiBody
ThingDef.description: 3rd of the Shiratsuyu-class destroyers, Murasame! Aren't all the Rainy destroyers stylish? With my sister ship Yuudachi, we formed the 2nd DesDiv. 'Rat Transport?' Well, excuse me, I did great at the Guadalcanal transport runs, you know!

ThingDef.label: RC MurasameKaiNiWig
ThingDef.description: Yes ye~s! I'm the Shiratsuyu-class destroyer 'Murasame'! Everyone, nice to meet you!

ThingDef.label: RC MurakumoKaiNiBody
ThingDef.description: Special type destroyer, fifth ship Murakumo. What? You don't know me? Really, that's impossible. Don't even know a famous ship like me, who participated in the Southern Operations, relief of Furutaka, and many other operations, you really are inept!

ThingDef.label: RC MurakumoKaiNiWig
ThingDef.description: Commander, do you best today too, I'll help out as well.

ThingDef.label: RC AkatsukiBody
ThingDef.description: I'm the 1st of the special type-III destroyers Akatsuki. Based on the Fubuki-class, with improved performance and range, the last word in destroyers! I'm quite the lady, you know! R-really, I am....

ThingDef.label: RC AkatsukiWig
ThingDef.description: I'm Akatsuki! Treat me like the fully-fledged lady that I am!

ThingDef.label: RC HibikiBody
ThingDef.description: Surviving till the very end among the many special-class destroyers was I, Hibiki. After experiencing several battles, I was unable to accompany the Yamato Surface Special Attack Force due to repairs. I was handed over to the Soviet Union as a prize of war, and was given a name that means "Faithful" (in Russian).

ThingDef.label: RC HibikiWig
ThingDef.description: I'm Hibiki. I'm also referred to as "The Phoenix" from my exploits.

ThingDef.label: RC IkazuchiBody
ThingDef.description: Together with my fellow destroyer Inazuma at the Battle of Surabaya, we rescued the survivors of the sunk enemy's ships. I think that strength just isn't enough. Don't you agree, Commander!?

ThingDef.label: RC IkazuchiWig
ThingDef.description: I'm Ikazuchi! Not 'Kaminari'! Please take care of that part too, okay!

ThingDef.label: RC InazumaBody
ThingDef.description: After helping to save the crew of the enemy ship sunk at Surabaya, I fought at Kiska, Solomon, New Guinea and Attu Island one after the other... I did my best...

ThingDef.label: RC InazumaWig
ThingDef.description: I'm Inazuma. Pleased to meet you.

ThingDef.label: RC FubukiBody
ThingDef.description: I am Fubuki, the first ship of the Special Type destroyers designed under the Washington Naval Treaty. We were superior to existing ship classifications and shocked the world. Based on our design, many following fleet-type destroyers were built. Yes sir, I'll do my best!

ThingDef.label: RC FubukiWig
ThingDef.description: Nice to meet you! I'm Fubuki! Thanks for having me!

ThingDef.label: RC AyanamiBody
ThingDef.description: Special class destroyer, Ayanami. I'm the first ship of the improved Fubuki class. In the Third Battle of the Solomon Sea, I showed an outstanding performance as a destroyer. I'll do my best!

ThingDef.label: RC AyanamiWig
ThingDef.description: Nice to meet you. I'm Ayanami, a special class destroyer.

ThingDef.label: RC KamikazeBody
ThingDef.description: I am the first of the Kamikaze-class Destroyers, Kamikaze. I am the nameship of a fleet destroyer designed during the Eight-eight Fleet Program era. We may be an older model compared to the Mutsuki-class, but i manage to run through that battle to the very end. I hope you'll remember who we are.

ThingDef.label: RC KamikazeWig
ThingDef.description: I've kept you waiting, commander. First ship of the Kamikaze-class destroyer, Kamikaze, has arrived. Are you ready, everyone? Follow me.

ThingDef.label: RC AsakazeBody
ThingDef.description: I am Asakaze, the second ship of the Kamikaze-class destroyers. Born in Nagasaki. Along with my sisters Harukaze and others, I formed the historic Fifth Destroyer Division. The flagship is naturally me. Participated in battles in the early stages of a war and strategy. Of course, I carried out also the important convoy escort firmly-strictly. Yeah... Went ahead, and tried everything!

ThingDef.label: RC AsakazeWig
ThingDef.description: Morning! I am Asakaze. The second ship of the Kamikaze-class destroyers, Asakaze. Commander, did you come to like morning? Have you liked it from before? ...Alright!

ThingDef.label: RC HarukazeBody
ThingDef.description: I am Harukaze, the 3rd ship of the Kamikaze-class destroyers. I was born in Maizuru. I used to be called Destroyer-5 but I later got an important name "Harukaze". I was in Destroyer Division 5 and also belonged in the 1st Surface Escort Division in which I helped protect everyone. Even if the fighting ends... I will protect you.

ThingDef.label: RC HarukazeWig
ThingDef.description: My name is Harukaze, I'm the 3rd ship of the Kamikaze-class destroyers. Commander-sama, I am pleased to make your acquaintance. I will support you until the end.

ThingDef.label: RC MatsukazeBody
ThingDef.description: I'm the fourth of the Kamikaze-class destroyers, Matsukaze. We're an outdated model? Hah! Jokes on you, pal. From the southwest front to Kolombangara, there's no way you can miss our role supporting the war effort as part of an escort fleet. Be sure to remember me, Matsukaze as well as my buddies, the Kamikaze-class. We're counting on you.

ThingDef.label: RC MatsukazeWig
ThingDef.description: It is i, Kamikaze-class destroyer number four, Matsukaze. You are, without a doubt, my commander. Exactly. You can always count on my back. Let us go, then.

ThingDef.label: RC Z1Body
ThingDef.description: The German-born destroyer, the first genuine large-type. This shifted high temperature, high pressure engine, it could only have been designed in the country of technical skills! I'm not so great at open-sea warfare though... I'll do my best!

ThingDef.label: RC Z1Wig
ThingDef.description: Good morning. I'm Leberecht Maass. Lebe is fine, yep.

ThingDef.label: RC Z3Body
ThingDef.description: Zerstörer 1934 program, third ship. I was designed with good survivability, but... these new turbines have a small issue with maintenance. This time... I shall be alright.

ThingDef.label: RC Z3Wig
ThingDef.description: Good day. I am the Destroyer Max Schultz. But, Max is fine. Pleased to meet you.
